column5: I have an older  eagle  explorer gps and would like to use it. It came with the boat I bought and a manuel that has got lost. Wondering if anyone has one kicking around they no longer need or know of where I might be able to find one. thanks.
thanks  . I found that after I posted I now have to go out and buy a printer cartridge.
Heh... You could probably buy a new GPS for less.
